tooltips.operationalFeatures: Access to dashboards, alerts, and forensic searches
tooltips.dashboardManagement: Create, modify, and delete dashboard layouts and widgets
tooltips.alertManagement: Configure alert rules, thresholds, and notification settings
tooltips.cameraConfiguration: Manage camera settings, streaming configurations, and recording parameters
tooltips.userManagement: Create, modify, and delete user accounts and role assignments
tooltips.systemSettings: Configure system-wide settings, backup/restore, and system maintenance

deleteUserDescription: This action is irreversible. {{username}} will be definitivly deleted.

deleteConfirmation.title: Are you sure?
deleteConfirmation.description: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.

retention.title: Retention
retention.description: Visualize and define how long your data will be retained.

storageImpact.title: Storage Impact
storageImpact.optimal: Optimal space savings. Ideal for data with low historical value.
storageImpact.balanced: Good balance between retention and space usage.
storageImpact.high: Higher space usage. Recommended for critical data requiring complete history.

toast.successDescription: Retention period successfully set to {{days}} days.
toast.errorDescription: Failed to update retention period. Please try again.

updateUser.title: Update user
updateUser.description: Change the privilege of the user

createUser.title: Create a new user
createUser.description: Fill in the form below & choose a privilege to create a new user account.

vms-settings.title: VMS Settings
vms-settings.description: Configure the settings for your video management system.

toast.errorDescription: Failed to update VMS Settings. Please try again.

ia-settings.title: AI Settings
